sentences.sContent: Elsie muttered something I couldn’t catch and walked off.
sentences.sCn: 埃尔茜咕哝了一句什么，我也没有听懂，她就走掉了。

remMethod.val: m ＋ utter(说) → 她轻声低语， 别人完全听不到 → 轻声低语

trans.tranCn: 轻声低语； 小声抱怨
trans.tranOther: to complain about something or express doubts about it, but without saying clearly and openly what you think
